name: Silver Daisy (Sparkling Rum Cocktail)
description: The French 75 goes a little tiki in this tart rum-based rendition from Jesse Cyr of Rob Roy in Seattle. Instead of the classic lemon, this version has lime and a little orange curaçao. The drink is festively fizzy, fruity, and tart, with an underlying vanilla flavor thanks to the rum.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce (22ml) fresh juice from 1 or 2 limes
1 1/2 ounces (45ml) lightly aged rum, such as El Dorado 5-Year

recipeInstructions.text: Add simple syrup, lime juice, curaçao, rum, and Angostura to a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 12 seconds. Strain into a Champagne flute and top with sparkling wine.
